name: Hot Buttered Bananas
description: A quick and easy dessert â€“ perfect for the fall season.
preparation: Cut each banana crosswise into 3 pieces. Cut each section in half lengthwise. Set aside.
Melt Hot Buttered Rum in frying pan over medium-high heat. Add cream and orange juice; stir continuously until sauce comes to a boil.
Add sliced bananas to pan. Gently stir to coat bananas with sauce. Cook for 2 minutes.
tips: Serve bananas over frozen yogurt or ice cream. Add a drizzle of melted Dark Belgian Chocolate, if desired.
